title: Collaborative English Learning Program Based on YouTube and MindMeister

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners use personal smartphones to watch YouTube content and MindMeister collaboration tools. Project focuses on English mathematical terminology

learning_goals: Learners can accurately pronounce 20+ academic English terms (mathematics field) using YouTube lecture videos.
Collaboratively write logical paragraphs of five or more sentences using English vocabulary learned via MindMeister maps.
Teams can upload English presentation videos to YouTube and deliver oral presentations.

resources: Mathematics Terminology English Translation Resource Compilation

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
